ActorTalk: The commandant would probably like this color of packaging... Wait, is that...?
I heard the early phase of the square construction went well, so I thought I'd come take a look.
I got you an aromatherapy diffuser. Liv said keeping it in your dorm helps relieve fatigue.
You've been working late helping with the planning here. Since you're supposed to be on break, please remember to get some proper rest, Commandant.
If any small tasks come up, just let me handle them.
Best services at Inn Elite. Welcome, valued customers. How may I assist you today?
Inn Elite is running a Golden Age Doll Revival event. Shop in-store to earn medals and join a lottery for limited-edition dolls.
Are you free, Commandant? I just bought something and got a few medals.
I want to join the event. And if there's time afterward, maybe we could look around the square together?
Then I'll be sure to remind you when needed, Commandant.
And if anything happens, reach out to me right away. I'll be right there to take on whatever I can.
Yup, will keep that in mind.
Some tasks just can't be avoided...
